subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: F.C. Dallas introduced the Brazilian star Denilson, and the club’s owner, Clark Hunt, called it one of the most important signings in the 12 years of M.L.S.
snippet: F.C. Dallas introduced the Brazilian star Denilson, and the club’s owner, Clark Hunt, called it one of the most important signings in the 12 years of M.L.S.
